title: How do I reduce my mobile data usage?
answer:
Turn off the mobile network when you do not need it. 

 Turn off the mobile network if you have a Wi-Fi connection. 

 Access Wireless Access Protocol (WAP) sites instead of World Wide Web (WWW) websites. 

 Turn off the mobile network by disabling Mobile data always on under Settings > More > Mobile networks. 

 [Drag the status bar down to display the notification panel. Turn off data synchronization.]()
